verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> was sick, <S%G770><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> of Bethany, <S%G963><s%> the village <S%G2968><s%> of Mary <S%G3137><s%> and her sister <S%G79><s%> Martha. <S%G3136><s%>

And it was the Mary <S%G3137><s%> who anointed <S%G218><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> with ointment, <S%G3464><s%> and wiped <S%G1591><s%> His feet <S%G4228><s%> with her hair, <S%G2359><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> was sick. <S%G770><s%>

The sisters <S%G79><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> to Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> he whom <S%G3739><s%> You love <S%G5368><s%> is sick. <S%G770><s%>"

But when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, He said, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> sickness <S%G769><s%> is not unto death, <S%G2288><s%> but for the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> may be glorified <S%G1392><s%> by it."
Now <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> Martha, <S%G3136><s%> and her sister, <S%G79><s%> and Lazarus. <S%G2976><s%>

When <S%G5613><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> He heard <S%G191><s%> that he was sick, <S%G770><s%> He stayed <S%G3306><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> [longer] in the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3739><s%> He was.
Then <S%G1899><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "Let us go <S%G71><s%> to Judea <S%G2453><s%> again. <S%G3825><s%>"

The disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> were just <S%G3568><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> to stone <S%G3034><s%> You, and are You going <S%G5217><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "Are there <S%G1563><s%> not twelve <S%G1427><s%> hours <S%G5610><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%>? If <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> walks <S%G4043><s%> in the day, <S%G2250><s%> he does not stumble, <S%G4350><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he sees <S%G991><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> world <S%G2889><s%>.
"But if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> walks <S%G4043><s%> in the night, <S%G3571><s%> he stumbles, <S%G4350><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> is not in him."

This <S%G3778><s%> He said, <S%G3004><s%> and after <S%G3326><s%> that He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Our friend <S%G5384><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> has fallen <S%G2837><s%> asleep; <S%G2837><s%> but I go, <S%G4198><s%> that I may awaken <S%G1852><s%> him out of sleep. <S%G1852><s%>"
The disciples <S%G3101><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he has fallen <S%G2837><s%> asleep, <S%G2837><s%> he will recover. <S%G4982><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had spoken <S%G3004><s%> of his death, <S%G2288><s%> but they thought <S%G1380><s%> that He was speaking <S%G3004><s%> of literal <S%G2838><s%> sleep. <S%G5258><s%>
Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them plainly, <S%G3954><s%> "Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> is dead, <S%G599><s%>
and I am <S%G5463><s%> glad <S%G5463><s%> for your sakes <S%G1223><s%> that I was not there, <S%G1563><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that you may believe; <S%G4100><s%> but let us go <S%G71><s%> to him. "

Thomas <S%G2381><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> who is called <S%G3004><s%> Didymus, <S%G1324><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to [his] fellow <S%G4827><s%> disciples, <S%G4827><s%> "Let us also <S%G2532><s%> go, <S%G71><s%> that we may die <S%G599><s%> with Him."

So <S%G3767><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> He found <S%G2147><s%> that he had already <S%G2235><s%> been <S%G2192><s%> in the tomb <S%G3419><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%> was near <S%G1451><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> two <S%G1178><s%> miles <S%G4712><s%> off; <S%G575><s%>

and many <S%G4183><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> had come <S%G2064><s%> to Martha <S%G3136><s%> and Mary, <S%G3137><s%> to console <S%G3888><s%> them concerning <S%G4012><s%> [their] brother. <S%G80><s%>

Martha <S%G3136><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> she heard <S%G191><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was coming, <S%G2064><s%> went <S%G5221><s%> to meet <S%G5221><s%> Him; but Mary <S%G3137><s%> still sat <S%G2516><s%> in the house. <S%G3624><s%>

Martha <S%G3136><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> You had been <S%G1510><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> my brother <S%G80><s%> would not have died. <S%G599><s%>
"Even <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> I know <S%G3609><s%> that whatever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> You ask <S%G154><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> You."
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Your brother <S%G80><s%> shall rise <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%>"
Martha <S%G3136><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "I know <S%G3609><s%> that he will rise <S%G450><s%> again <S%G450><s%> in the resurrection <S%G386><s%> on the last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "I am <S%G1510><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> and the life; <S%G2222><s%> he who believes <S%G4100><s%> in Me shall live <S%G2198><s%> even <S%G2579><s%> if <S%G2579><s%> he dies, <S%G599><s%>
and everyone <S%G3956><s%> who lives <S%G2198><s%> and believes <S%G4100><s%> in Me shall never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> die. <S%G599><s%> Do you believe <S%G4100><s%> this <S%G3778><s%>? "

She said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> I have believed <S%G4100><s%> that You are the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> [even] He who comes <S%G2064><s%> into the world. <S%G2889><s%>"

And when she had said <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> she went <S%G565><s%> away, <S%G565><s%> and called <S%G5455><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> her sister, <S%G79><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> secretly, <S%G2977><s%> "The Teacher <S%G1320><s%> is here, <S%G3918><s%> and is calling <S%G5455><s%> for you."
And when <S%G5613><s%> she heard <S%G191><s%> it, she arose <S%G1453><s%> quickly, <S%G5035><s%> and was coming <S%G2064><s%> to Him.

Now <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had not yet <S%G3768><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> into the village, <S%G2968><s%> but was still <S%G2089><s%> in the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Martha <S%G3136><s%> met <S%G5221><s%> Him.

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> who were with her in the house, <S%G3614><s%> and consoling <S%G3888><s%> her, when they saw <S%G3708><s%> that Mary <S%G3137><s%> rose <S%G450><s%> up quickly <S%G5030><s%> and went <S%G1831><s%> out, followed <S%G190><s%> her, supposing <S%G1380><s%> that she was going <S%G5217><s%> to the tomb <S%G3419><s%> to weep <S%G2799><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>

Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was, she saw <S%G3708><s%> Him, and fell <S%G4098><s%> at His feet, <S%G4228><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> You had been <S%G1510><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> my brother <S%G80><s%> would not have died. <S%G599><s%>"

When <S%G5613><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> her weeping, <S%G2799><s%> and the Jews <S%G2453><s%> who came <S%G4905><s%> with her, [also] weeping, <S%G2799><s%> He was deeply <S%G1690><s%> moved <S%G1690><s%> in spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and was troubled, <S%G5015><s%>
and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Where <S%G4226><s%> have you laid <S%G5087><s%> him?" They said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> and see. <S%G3708><s%>"
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> wept. <S%G1145><s%>
And so <S%G3767><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Behold <S%G2396><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> He loved <S%G5368><s%> him!"

But some <S%G5100><s%> of them said, <S%G3004><s%> "Could <S%G1410><s%> not this <S%G3778><s%> man, <S%G3778><s%> who opened <S%G455><s%> the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of him who was blind, <S%G5185><s%> have <S%G4160><s%> kept <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> from dying <S%G599><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> being deeply <S%G1690><s%> moved <S%G1690><s%> within, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1438><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to the tomb. <S%G3419><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> it was a cave, <S%G4693><s%> and a stone <S%G3037><s%> was lying <S%G1945><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> it.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Remove <S%G142><s%> the stone. <S%G3037><s%>" Martha, <S%G3136><s%> the sister <S%G79><s%> of the deceased, <S%G5053><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> by this <S%G2235><s%> time <S%G2235><s%> there will be a stench, <S%G3605><s%> for he has been <S%G1510><s%> [dead] four <S%G5066><s%> days. <S%G5066><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Did I not say <S%G3004><s%> to you, if <S%G1437><s%> you believe, <S%G4100><s%> you will see <S%G3708><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>?"

And so <S%G3767><s%> they removed <S%G142><s%> the stone. <S%G3037><s%> And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> raised <S%G142><s%> His eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Father, <S%G3962><s%> I thank <S%G2168><s%> Thee that Thou heardest <S%G191><s%> Me.

"And I knew <S%G3609><s%> that Thou hearest <S%G191><s%> Me always; <S%G3842><s%> but because <S%G1223><s%> of the people <S%G3793><s%> standing <S%G4026><s%> around <S%G4026><s%> I said <S%G3004><s%> it, that they may believe <S%G4100><s%> that Thou didst send <S%G649><s%> Me."

And when He had said <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> He cried <S%G2905><s%> out with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> "Lazarus, <S%G2976><s%> come <S%G1204><s%> forth. <S%G1854><s%>"

He who had died <S%G2348><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> and foot <S%G4228><s%> with wrappings; <S%G2750><s%> and his face <S%G3799><s%> was wrapped <S%G4019><s%> around <S%G4019><s%> with a cloth. <S%G4676><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Unbind <S%G3089><s%> him, and let <S%G863><s%> him go. <S%G5217><s%>"

Many <S%G4183><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> who had come <S%G2064><s%> to Mary <S%G3137><s%> and beheld <S%G2300><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> He had done, <S%G4160><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> in Him.

But some <S%G5100><s%> of them went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> to the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> and told <S%G3004><s%> them the things which <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had done. <S%G4160><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> convened <S%G4863><s%> a council, <S%G4892><s%> and were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> are we doing <S%G4160><s%>? For this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is performing <S%G4160><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> signs. <S%G4592><s%>

"If <S%G1437><s%> we let <S%G863><s%> Him [go on] like <S%G3779><s%> this, <S%G3779><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G3956><s%> will believe <S%G4100><s%> in Him, and the Romans <S%G4514><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%> and take <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> our place <S%G5117><s%> and our nation. <S%G1484><s%>"

But a certain <S%G5100><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them, Caiaphas, <S%G2533><s%> who was high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> that year, <S%G1763><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "You know <S%G3609><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> at all, <S%G3762><s%>

nor <S%G3761><s%> do you take <S%G3049><s%> into account <S%G3049><s%> that it is expedient <S%G4851><s%> for you that one <S%G1520><s%> man <S%G444><s%> should die <S%G599><s%> for the people, <S%G2992><s%> and that the whole <S%G3650><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> should not perish. <S%G622><s%> "

Now <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> he did not say <S%G3004><s%> on his own <S%G1438><s%> initiative; <S%G1438><s%> but being <S%G1510><s%> high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> that year, <S%G1763><s%> he prophesied <S%G4395><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was going <S%G3195><s%> to die <S%G599><s%> for the nation, <S%G1484><s%>

and not for the nation <S%G1484><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but that He might also <S%G2532><s%> gather <S%G4863><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> into one <S%G1520><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> who are scattered <S%G1287><s%> abroad. <S%G1287><s%>
So <S%G3767><s%> from that day <S%G2250><s%> on they planned <S%G1011><s%> together <S%G1011><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> Him.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> continued to walk <S%G4043><s%> publicly <S%G3954><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> but went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> from there <S%G1564><s%> to the country <S%G5561><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> into a city <S%G4172><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Ephraim; <S%G2187><s%> and there <S%G2546><s%> He stayed <S%G3306><s%> with the disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the Passover <S%G3957><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> was at hand, <S%G1451><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> out of the country <S%G5561><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the Passover, <S%G3957><s%> to purify <S%G48><s%> themselves. <S%G1438><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> they were seeking <S%G2212><s%> for Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and were saying <S%G3004><s%> to one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> as they stood <S%G2476><s%> in the temple, <S%G2413><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> do you think; <S%G1380><s%> that He will not come <S%G2064><s%> to the feast <S%G1859><s%> at all <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%>?"

Now <S%G1161><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> had given <S%G1325><s%> orders <S%G1785><s%> that if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> He was, he should report <S%G3377><s%> it, that they might seize <S%G4084><s%> Him.
